attributes.title: I wish I could leave a zero!
attributes.review: I open this app and immediately have to give way too much of my personal info. It tried to harass me with notifications, texts, and calls. Like ma’am...no thank you. Also like, I don’t want an app dedicated to a Cheeto thank you very much!

attributes.title: Why
attributes.review: It asked for personal information. i opened it and it glitched and said on the screen “it was watching me” I got freaked out set down my phone and walked to the kitchen to clear my mind. I walked out and on the counter there was a hot Cheeto writing vote trump or get slapped with celery. So I deleted the app and never got slapped luckily :)

attributes.title: Almost died while downloading this app!!
attributes.review: When I opened the app, it played music that suddenly triggered my cat to uncontrollably vomit in my dishwasher. While cleaning this vomit the unbearable stench caused me to reel back and I hit my head on the countertop. And due to corona I was unable to be taken to the hospital therefore I died. Thank you. 🧚✨🥰

attributes.title: HORRIBLE
attributes.review: this app is horrifying i opened it up to see a large cheese ball in my face and LET ME JUS TELL YOU i hate cheese balls , they dissolve in ur mouth and just ew. and my pet tyrannosaurus rex said he also didn’t like it either so i would jus appreciate if you would take this app down so that nobody else gets scarred for life❤️.

attributes.title: Fake News
attributes.review: I can’t believe how long this app took to load and when it finally did there was big fat old white supremacist on my screen. I can’t believe such NASTY things are allowed on this app! I’ve seen the same guy say he wanted to have sex with his own daughter UGH! 🤢🤮

attributes.title: This ain’t it🥱
attributes.review: I went to open the app and boom my pet giraffe started to play just dance 2016 so you already know I had to hop on that. Anyways I walked into my fridge and to my disgust I saw a soggy waffle. Who in their right mind leaves half a taco in the freezer??? Now I’m thinking to myself what if a watermelone just knocked on my door!??? Deadass 😰

attributes.title: ABSOLUTELY HORRIBLE
attributes.review: when i went to open this app for the first time, all that popped up was a picture of donald trump NUDE!! i was babysitting at the time and the children saw, told the parents, and i got fired and they called the cops on me!! this app is horrible and a disgrace. i would rate it 0 out of 5 stars if i could 🤬🤬🤬

attributes.title: Horrible 😔
attributes.review: This app is absolutely horrible, the first thing I see when I open it , is Mr. Orange hair holding his fist up as though he’s symbolizing peace and equality when all he want to do is enslave all African Americans, this all need to be deleted immediately Trump is up to no good , for god sakes he sex traffics poor innocent little girls and women.

attributes.title: AWFUL!! 0 Stars !!!!
attributes.review:
This app is terrible!! I wish I could rate 0 stars!! It’s buggy and lags and never works, and I can’t stand it!!

...Not to mention the fact that Trump is literally an awful president and is trying to get rid of TikTok just so the Gen Z kids can’t take over his precious little rallies 🤡🤡

attributes.title: WROST APP!
attributes.review: First off this app is so gross it shows naked pics of him!!🤮🤮 This app is helpful to NOTHING if I’m being honest!🙄 It put vary bad pics and videos of him that no kid or ANYONE would want to see!😩🤢🤮 It also give false information! That’s one of the worst things you could do🙄😬 This app need to get taking down!
